paragonBoards.name: Legendary Node
paragonBoards.title: Blood Rage
paragonBoards.description: Killing a Bleeding enemy has 10% chance to grant Berserking for 5 seconds. Your damage is increased by x10% of your Damage while Berserking bonus, up to a maximum x30%.

paragonBoards.name: Legendary Node
paragonBoards.title: Bone Breaker
paragonBoards.description: Every 12 seconds, your next Skill is guaranteed to Overpower.

paragonBoards.name: Legendary Node
paragonBoards.title: Carnage
paragonBoards.description: While Berserking, Critical Strikes increase your Attack Speed by +2%, up to +16% for 6 seconds.

paragonBoards.name: Legendary Node
paragonBoards.title: Decimator
paragonBoards.description: Each time you make an enemy Vulnerable, your damage is increased by 10% for 5 seconds. Overpowering a Vulnerable enemy grants an additional x10% bonus for 5 seconds.

paragonBoards.name: Legendary Node
paragonBoards.title: Flawless Technique
paragonBoards.description: Damaging enemies with One-Handed Weapons increases your Critical Strike chance by x1% for 4 seconds, up to x8%. This can only happen once per Skill cast, or twice per second while channeling Whirlwind.

paragonBoards.name: Legendary Node
paragonBoards.title: Hemorrhage
paragonBoards.description: Your Bleeding damage is increased by x15% of your Vulnerable Damage Bonus, up to x45%.

paragonBoards.name: Legendary Node
paragonBoards.title: Warbringer
paragonBoards.description: For every 75 Fury you spend, gain 15% of your Maximum Life as Fortify.

paragonBoards.name: Legendary Node
paragonBoards.title: Weapons Master
paragonBoards.description: Swapping weapons grants you 8% of your Maximum Fury.

paragonBoards.name: Legendary Node
paragonBoards.title: Ancestral Guidance
paragonBoards.description: After spending 75 Spirit, you deal x30% increased damage for 5 seconds.

paragonBoards.name: Legendary Node
paragonBoards.title: Constricting Tendrils
paragonBoards.description: Lucky Hit: Nature Magic Skills have up to a 15% chance to entangle the enemy with vines, Immobilizing them for 2 seconds and Poisoning them for 150% of the Base damage dealt over 4 seconds.

paragonBoards.name: Legendary Node
paragonBoards.title: Earthen Devastation
paragonBoards.description: Your Earth Skills deal x10% increased Critical Strike Damage, increased by x20% of your Damage vs Crowd Controlled bonus, up to x40%.

paragonBoards.name: Legendary Node
paragonBoards.title: Heightened Malice
paragonBoards.description: While there are 3 or more Poisoned enemies Nearby, you deal x45% increased damage.

paragonBoards.name: Legendary Node
paragonBoards.title: Inner Beast
paragonBoards.description: After Shapeshifting, your Spirit costs are reduced by 5% for 10 seconds, up to 45%. If you reach 10 stacks, this bonus resets and reduces the Cooldown of your Ultimate Skill by 5 seconds.

paragonBoards.name: Legendary Node
paragonBoards.title: Lust for Carnage
paragonBoards.description: Critical Strikes with Werewolf Skills restore 2 Spirit.

paragonBoards.name: Legendary Node
paragonBoards.title: Survival Instincts
paragonBoards.description: While in Werebear form, you deal x1% increased damage, up to x50%, for every 1% difference in current Life percent between you and the enemy.

paragonBoards.name: Legendary Node
paragonBoards.title: Thunderstruck
paragonBoards.description: Storm Skills deal increased damage equal to x20% of your Damage vs Close and Damage vs Distant bonuses, up to x60%.

paragonBoards.name: Legendary Node
paragonBoards.title: Blood Begets Blood
paragonBoards.description: Blood Orbs grant x10% increased damage, up to x50%, for 5 seconds.

paragonBoards.name: Legendary Node
paragonBoards.title: Bloodbath
paragonBoards.description: Deal x70% increased Overpower damage.

paragonBoards.name: Legendary Node
paragonBoards.title: Bone Graft
paragonBoards.description: Hitting enemies with Bone Skills increases your damage by x1% and your Maximum Essence by 2 for 8 seconds, stacks up to x8% increased damage and 16 Maximum Essence.

paragonBoards.name: Legendary Node
paragonBoards.title: Cult Leader
paragonBoards.description: Your Minions deal x30% increased damage for each x20% of Attack Speed Bonus they have, up to a maximum of 100% Attack Speed Bonus.

paragonBoards.name: Legendary Node
paragonBoards.title: Flesh-eater
paragonBoards.description: Consuming 5 Corpses grants x40% increased damage for 6 seconds.

paragonBoards.name: Legendary Node
paragonBoards.title: Hulking Monstrosity
paragonBoards.description: Your Golem has x40% increased Maximum Life and deals x100% increased damage.

paragonBoards.name: Legendary Node
paragonBoards.title: Scent of Death
paragonBoards.description: With at least 2 Corpses Nearby, you gain 15% Damage Reduction. With no Corpses Nearby, you deal x15% increased damage.

paragonBoards.name: Legendary Node
paragonBoards.title: Wither
paragonBoards.description: Your Shadow damage over time effects have a x5% chance to deal x50% bonus damage each time they deal damage. This chance is increased by x1% and bonus damage is increased by x4% for each 60 Intelligence you have, up to 1200 Intelligence.

paragonBoards.name: Legendary Node
paragonBoards.title: Cheap Shot
paragonBoards.description: You deal x5% increased damage for each Nearby enemy that is Crowd Controlled, up to x25%. A Nearby Staggered Boss provides the maximum bonus.

paragonBoards.name: Legendary Node
paragonBoards.title: Cunning Stratagem
paragonBoards.description: Your non-damage Combo Point bonuses are increased by x33.33% when you spend 3 Combo Points.

paragonBoards.name: Legendary Node
paragonBoards.title: Deadly Ambush
paragonBoards.description: You deal x22.5% increased Critical Strike Damage to enemies affected by your Trap Skills.

paragonBoards.name: Legendary Node
paragonBoards.title: Eldritch Bounty
paragonBoards.description: When you attack with an Imbued Skill, you gain +3% Maximum Resistance and 20% increased damage for that Imbuement's element for 9 seconds.

paragonBoards.name: Legendary Node
paragonBoards.title: Exploit Weakness
paragonBoards.description: Lucky Hit: Hitting a vulnerable enemy has up to a 60% chance to increase your damage by x1% for 25 seconds, up to x25%. At 25 stacks the bonus remains for 6 seconds then expires.

paragonBoards.name: Legendary Node
paragonBoards.title: Leyrana's Instinct
paragonBoards.description: When Inner Sight’s gauge becomes full, you gain +100% Dodge Chance for 2 seconds. Your Core Skills deal increased damage equal to x25% of your Core Skill Damage Bonus while Inner Sight’s gauge remains full, up to x35%.

paragonBoards.name: Legendary Node
paragonBoards.title: No Witnesses
paragonBoards.description: Your Ultimate Skills gain an additional x10% damage from your Damage with Ultimate bonus, up to x45%, and grant this bonus to all Skills for 10 seconds when cast.

paragonBoards.name: Legendary Node
paragonBoards.title: Tricks of the Trade
paragonBoards.description: Your Marksman Skills grant your Cutthroat Skills x25% increased damage for 8 seconds. Your Cutthroat Skills grant your Marksman Skills x25% increased damage for 8 seconds.

paragonBoards.name: Legendary Node
paragonBoards.title: Burning Instinct
paragonBoards.description: Your Burning damage is increased by x10% of your Critical Strike Damage Bonus, plus x1% for every 20 Intelligence you have, up to x80%.

paragonBoards.name: Legendary Node
paragonBoards.title: Ceaseless Conduit
paragonBoards.description: Crackling Energy has a 25% chance to not consume a Charge when triggered. Crackling Energy's damage is increased by x2% per 25 total Intelligence you have, up to x120%.

paragonBoards.name: Legendary Node
paragonBoards.title: Elemental Summoner
paragonBoards.description: Your Conjuration Skills have x10% reduced Cooldown or Mana cost. They also deal bonus damage equal to x10% of the total amount of your Bonus Damage with Fire, Lightning, and Cold, up to x60%.

paragonBoards.name: Legendary Node
paragonBoards.title: Enchantment Master
paragonBoards.description: Your Enchantments are 20% stronger.

paragonBoards.name: Legendary Node
paragonBoards.title: Frigid Fate
paragonBoards.description: You deal bonus damage to Vulnerable enemies equal to x20% of the total amount of your Bonus Damage with Cold, up to a maximum of x60%.

paragonBoards.name: Legendary Node
paragonBoards.title: Icefall
paragonBoards.description: Your Frost skills deal x18% increased damage to Vulnerable enemies. This bonus is doubled if the enemy is also Frozen.

paragonBoards.name: Legendary Node
paragonBoards.title: Searing Heat
paragonBoards.description: Pyromancy skills have a +12% increased Critical Strike Chance and deal increased Direct damage equal to 20% of your Damage with Fire bonus, up to x60%.

paragonBoards.name: Legendary Node
paragonBoards.title: Static Surge
paragonBoards.description: After spending 100 Mana, your next cast of Chain Lightning or Charged Bolts makes enemies Vulnerable for 2 seconds and restores 10% of your Mana. This Mana cost requirement is reduced by Mana Cost Reduction bonuses.
